200.description: Used to create the Products Based on the seletced Service Type and Category details ( SVOD, Content , Linear, Hardware, Merchandise, Broadband, Wilreline etc--)

200.description: Used to create the Packages of type Recurring, Onetime and Both
Used to create the Promotions on seletced Products and Packages ( Product, Dependent, PrePay, PayInAdvance, OrderItems, OrderAmount etc--)
Used to get the List of all the created Products
Used to get the List of all the created Packages
Used to get the List of all the created Promotions
Used to get the list of Products and Packages along with Promotions based on the Sales Channel and Offer Type
Used to search particular Products, Packages and Promotions based on the different parameters like Name, SKU, Price, Workflow --
Used to add different types of Prices to Products, Packages and Promotions
Used to add or update the Platform details to the particular payment mode
Used to get channel categories and its associalted channel list
Used to get different Price details of a particular Product or Package or Promotion
Used to add or update different Operators (Airtel, Aircel, Idea, Reliance,ect ---) for the Payment Modes defined in the system
Used to get the Payment Modes details along with associated Platforms, Operators, Products, Packages and Additional Info details
Used to create Payment Modes in multiple DMAs
Used to update Payment Modes in multiple DMAs
Used to add or update Additional Info details ( Auto Renew, Coupon Eligibility, Free Trail ) to the Payment Modes
Used to set the Upgrade and Downgrade plans to the Products and Packages
Used to set the App Channel, App Product Id and App Product Name details to the Products and Packages
Used to get the App Channels, App Product Id and App Product Name details of  Products and Packages
Used  to get the Basic Details of the Products like Name, SKU, Display Name, Start Date , Subscription Type, Price details
Used to get the Configured Pre - Requisite Products and Packages details
Used to get the History related data of the Products, Packages and Promotions ( Sales channels, App channels , Langauges, Attributes )
Used to set the Attribute related data to Products and Packages
Used to get the Attribute related data of Products and Packages
Used to add or update the Eligibility rules of Products and Packages of particular BU
Used to add or update the Sales Channels, Offer Types and Group Details of the Products, Packages and Promotions
Used  to get the Basic and Commercial details of the Packages (like Name, SKU, Display Name, Start Date , Package Type, Price details etc)
Used to add or update the Additional details (like Available Users, Languages, Refund, Workflow etc) of Products, Packages and Promotions

200.description: Used to get the Additional Details of Products, Packages and Promotions (like Available Users, Languages, Refund, Workflow etc)
Used to Delete the Products, Packages and Promotions from the system
Used  to get the Basic and Commercial details (like Name, SKU, Display Name, Start Date , Promotion Category, Products/Packages details etc) of the Promotions defined in the system
Used to get the Sales Channels, Offer Types and Groups Details of the Products, Packages and Promotions defined in the system
Used to set the Pre - Requisite Products/ Packages for Products or Packages defined in the system
Used to get the Promotion Eligibility Rules of the Products
Used to update the Promotion Eligibility Rules of a Product
Used to Clear all the Existing Eligibility Rules defined for that particular Product or Package
Used to get the Installments details defined under Business Unit level
Used to add or update Products to the Payment Modes defined for the BU
Used to add or update Packages to the Payment Modes defined for the BU
Used to update the Line Up Numbers of the Channels
Used to create the Installment Details of a product
Used to remove the Installment Details of a product
Used to get the Installment details configured to a Product
Used to get the Upgrade and Downgrade Plan details of a particular Product or Package
Used to get the Eligibility Details of the Products and Packages of Particular BU
Used to remove the Payment Modes configured in the system
